name: soul//defrag: fragment #1
description:
Yay!

Y-you made it!

Um, so like welcome to soul//defrag: fragment #1! 

That's a super-duper v-vague and mysterious t-title, huh?!

Anyway! Hi! I'm Roslyn! I'm t-totally not the main character.  I just like being super helpful and supportive to others!

I'm not really good at talking to people, so-so... I'll just uh...

What was I talking about? E-eek!

*frantically flips through a script.*

O-oh right! The game! It's a super short and sweet kinetic Visual Novel about... um... like how far you'd go to kinda... protect someone(like me!)that you've just met. 

I-I mean, wouldn't you? R-right!?

Huh. Now that uh... I mention it... I-I hope no one gets hurt!

Crap!  I got all rambly! Just p-please play it!

Super Awesome Features:

  • Meet a charming, cute girl!(That's me!...I hope...)
  • 30 minutes of gameplay!(TV show length... without the commercials. Yay!)
  • Atmospheric and Moody music!(I'm just reading the script now...)
  • Action and Suspense!(I don't know what that last word means!)
  • It's like SUPER DUPER FREE!(Like, you got nothing to lose!)

I-I'd love to see your feedback below so p-please consider showing some love down below!! Thanks~ Teehee!

Oh and like, i-if you're interested in seeing more stories and games set in this world, please head on over and join our newsletter at https://lunaticwolfgames.carrd.co/!
